txt.en: 'We have always been few in number here at Stangard.'
'Things have been hard, but the men and beasts of this outpost have never starved.'
'Sithric was sent by Th√©oden King to oversee Stangard...'
'I do not stand up for them as I should!'
'...but since then, things have grown worse.'
'I have been too afraid of going against the wishes of the king.'
'He came to ensure that this distant outpost was to provide adequate protection at Rohan's edge...'
'But I am not afraid anymore. I see what is right.'
'...but he thwarts all that we would do to be effective!'
'You have done more for us since your arrival than Sithric has let us do in a month.'
'The men begin to hate me, but I cannot blame them.'
